mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN TEAM_LEGAL_ENTITY_TET TET ON TET.ID_TEM_TET = TEM.ID_TEM JOIN LEGAL_ENTITY_MASTER_ETY ETY ON ETY.ID_ETY = TET.ID_ETY_TET JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT WHERE RCT.CODE_RCT = #{code}

SELECT ID_RCT As 'recipientId',NAME_RCT AS 'recipientName',CODE_RCT AS 'recipientCode' FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT UNION SELECT ID_DTM As 'recipientId',NAME_DTM AS 'recipientName',CODE_DTM AS 'recipientCode' FROM DOCTOR_MASTER_DTM
SELECT ID_ULV as 'recipientDesignationId',NAME_ULV as 'recipientDesignationName' FROM USER_LOV_ULV WHERE TYPE_ULV = 'DESIGNATION'

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT = #{recipientStatus}

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.CODE_RCT = #{code}

SELECT RCT.*,ULV.ID_ULV,ULV.NAME_ULV,SLV.ID_SLV,SLV.NAME_SLV,TEM.ID_TEM,TEM.NAME_TEM,BUM.ID_BUM,BUM.NAME_BUM FROM RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT JOIN USER_LOV_ULV ULV ON ULV.ID_ULV = RCT.ID_DESG_ULV_RCT JOIN SYSTEM_LOV_SLV SLV ON SLV.ID_SLV = RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = RCT.ID_TEM_RCT JOIN BU_MASTER_BUM BUM ON BUM.ID_BUM = RCT.ID_BUM_RCT WHERE RCT.NAME_RCT = #{name}
select * from RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT where ID_DESG_ULV_RCT = #{designationId} and ID_TEM_RCT = #{teamId} and ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT = '80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73'

SELECT RCT.* FROM COST_CENTER_MASTER_CCM CCM JOIN COSTCENTER_BRAND_CBR CBR ON CBR.ID_CCM_CBR = CCM.ID_CCM JOIN BRAND_MASTER_BRD BRD ON BRD.ID_BRD = CBR.ID_BRD_CBR JOIN TEAM_BRAND_TBR TBR ON TBR.ID_BRD_TBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = TBR.ID_TEM_TBR JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM WHERE ID_CCM = #{ccmId} AND RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT = '80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73'

SELECT RCT.* from BRAND_MASTER_BRD BRD JOIN TEAM_BRAND_TBR TBR ON TBR.ID_BRD_TBR = BRD.ID_BRD JOIN TEAM_MASTER_TEM TEM ON TEM.ID_TEM = TBR.ID_TEM_TBR JOIN RECIPIENT_MASTER_RCT RCT ON RCT.ID_TEM_RCT = TEM.ID_TEM WHERE ID_brd = #{ccmId} AND RCT.ID_STATUS_SLV_RCT = '80BC3490-9F53-4C92-8DBA-3D5C7755FD73'
